channel.title: Boats on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Boats on Ksbigbass

item.title: Minn Kota Terrova Trick
item.description:
Transducer Wire Pinch Point Issue

  1. Add a rubber stopper to the shaft of the TM.

  2. **Find a nice big rubber grommet at Lowes and drill out the center of it just enough that the composite shaft will slide through with a little bit of effort.
    **

  3. Remove the top of the TM Head and shaft from the motor.

  4. Spray a little WD40 on the rubber grommet and slide it down as far as possible.

item.title: Ranger Boats: Road Armor Trailer Axle Problems
item.description:
Very common, unfortunately, a know bad weld exists on the early road armor trailers.

The biggest issue was with the single axle trailers for the 188’s and the 519’s but also with the tandem trailers.

This could save a life. As “new to me” owners should be aware of this important safety issue.

2004-2010 years mainly affected.

Broken Trailer Axle on this Ranger 520 bass boat.

Check the welds on the axles see if there is any visible cracking or separation.

item.title: Optimax/DFI or Premium Plus?
item.description:
Optimax/DFI or Premium Plus? Who hasn’t had that question go through their head if they own a Mercury Marine Optimax Outboard Motor.

This official letter from Mercury Marine puts an end to the debate about which oil the OptiMax should have run through its oil injectors.

Away from the dealer and standing in front of a shelf of oil and wonder which one won’t blow up your motor?

Outboards blow up. Trying to limit that is what we all attempt to do.

item.title: Shinichi Fukae wrecks his boat
item.description:
Shinichi Fukae wrecks his boat: Professional bass fisherman, Shinichi Fukae and his cameraman were injured Sunday afternoon

June 22, 2011.

Shinichi Fukae wrecks his boat

Paris Post-Intelligencer Shinichi Fukae wrecks his ride

Shinichi Fukae tournament boat crashed into a concrete pillar of the Ned McWherter Bridge at Paris Landing State Park.
